summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 989, for the improvement of Colorado Street from Massachusetts Street to Atlantic Street and Railroad Avenue from Atlantic Street to Connecticut Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers a proper outfall sewer of Connecticut Street from Railroad Avenue to half tide, and other appurtenances therein under Ordinance No. 11328 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
